column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bumi says : " Your final test is a duel .
#Text=" Aang says : " So ... you 're saying whoever I point to , that 's the person I get to fight ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " Choose wisely !
#Text=" Aang says : " I ... choose ... you .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Wrong choice !
#Text=" Bumi says : " You thought I was a frail old man , but I 'm the most powerful earthbender you 'll ever see .
#Text=" Aang says : " Can I fight the guy with the axe instead ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " There are no take - backsies in my kingdom .
#Text=You might need this .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Typical airbender tactic : avoid and evade .
#Text=I hoped the Avatar would be less predictable .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Do n't you have any surprises for me ?
#Text=Sooner or later you 'll have to strike back !
#Text=" Bumi says : " You 'll have to be a little more creative than that !
#Text=" Bumi says : " Did someone leave the windows open ?
#Text=It feels a little drafty in here .
#Text=Are you hoping I 'll catch a cold ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " How are you going to get me from way over there ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " Well done , Avatar .
#Text=You fight with much fire in your heart .
#Text=You 've passed all my tests .
#Text=Now , you must answer one question .
#Text=" Aang says : " That 's not fair !
#Text=You said you would release my friends if I finished your tests .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Oh , but what 's the point of tests if you do n't learn anything ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh , come on !
#Text=" Bumi says : " Answer this one question and I will set your friends free .
#Text=What ... is my name ?
#Text=From the looks of your friends I 'd say you only have a few minutes .
#Text=" Aang says : " How am I supposed to know his name ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Think about the challenges .
#Text=Maybe it 's some kind of riddle .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I got it !
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " He 's an earthbender , right ?
#Text=Rocky .
#Text=You know , because of all the rocks .
#Text=" Katara says : " We 're going to keep trying , but that is a good back - up .
#Text=" Aang says : " Okay .
#Text=So back to the challenges .
#Text=I got a key from the waterfall , I saved his pet , and I had a duel .
#Text=" Katara says : " And what did you learn ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , everything was different than I expected .
#Text=" Katara says : " And ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , they were n't straight forward .
#Text=To solve each test , I had to think differently than I usually would .
#Text=I know his name .
#Text="
